questions.text: Which of these video game characters does not wear a red shirt?
questions.explanation:
Donkey Kong.

	Sora is the main character of both the "Kingdom Hearts" games for PS2.  He wears a red shirt in the second game when he transforms into Valor.  His outfit is entirely red.  Mario is a famous plumber who always wears a red shirt.  Diddy Kong wears both a red shirt and hat.  Donkey Kong wears a red tie, but he is topless!

questions.text: Which of these "Legos" video games has a character named Satipo?
questions.explanation:
Indiana Jones.

	"Lego: Indiana Jones" follows the first three movies, as close as you can possibly get.  It can be found on many consoles, including the PS2 and the Wii.  "Lego: Star Wars" comes in three different games...  The first, the second, and the complete saga.  The "Complete Saga" edition comes with bonus levels not found in the other two games.  It can be found in several consoles, including the Wii and the Nintendo DS.  "Lego: Batman" is the newest, first sold in September of 2008.  It follows movies with Batman and Robin.  It can be sold on many different consoles as well, including the Wii.

questions.text: Which of these characters was created by an evil scientist?
questions.explanation:
Crash Bandicoot.

	Crash Bandicoot was created by the evil Dr. Neo Cortex.  Dr. Cortex did not end up liking his creation, and has sought out to destroy Crash Bandicoot in almost every "Crash" game.

questions.text: Which of these golfers has a video game series on the PS2?
questions.explanation:
Tiger Woods.

	The "Tiger Woods PGA Gold Tour" series is all about golf.  You can choose your club, aim your shot, and shoot.  There are also a few of these games out on the Wii, where you can actually perform the movements of golf as if you were actually playing!

questions.text: In "Sly Cooper," where do you view all of Bentley's slide shows?
questions.explanation:
In the safehouse.

	On "Sly Cooper" for PS2, you are always in the safehouse when you learn of Bentley's plans.  He uses a cheap slide show presentation to show pictures and talk about his plans.  If you see black dust marks on the screen when he shows these, like I did, do not worry!  They are on HIS screen, not yours!  Your TV is not that dirty.  :-)

questions.text: In "Kingdom Hearts II," what is the name of the cult that wear black robes?
questions.explanation:
Organization XIII (13).

	Organization XIII is the main enemy group of the game.  Many characters, including Roxas and Riku, are part of this group, although they either do not know it or do not want to be.  The group became known as "Organization XIII" because there were originally 13 members.  The members of the group all lack hearts, but still have emotions.  This game is for the PS2.

questions.text: What is the name of Dr. Neo Cortex's niece?
questions.explanation:
Nina Cortex.

	Nina Cortex is first introduced in "Crash Twinsanity" for the PS2.  She is a playable character in the game, as Crash and Dr. Cortex have become allies.  In "Crash of the Titans," however, she takes over for Neo and tries to destroy Crash Bandicoot.

questions.text: Which of these is the title of a "Star Wars" game based on the second episode?
questions.explanation:
Attack of the Clones.

	"Star Wars: Attack of the Clones" is based off of the second episode.  The video games is mainly played in vehicles, but you do control other characters throughout the game as well.  It continues on through part of episode three, "Revenge of the Sith."  The video game is for PS2.

questions.text: Which of these is NOT an enemy of Sly Cooper?
questions.explanation:
Ripto.

	Ripto is an enemy from some of the "Spyro" games.  Octavio is a dog who sings opera, and wants to get back at Venice for preferring rock music.  He pumps tar into the canals!  Dimitri is an evil lizard who makes money using the Clockwerk tail feathers.  Jean Bison has no reason for being evil.  He is a bison who once lived in the 1800s, but was frozen, and has now thawed to our day.

questions.text: Which of these is a Spyro game where you fight the Sorceress and meet Sheila the kangaroo?
options: Legend of Spyro: A New Beginning
questions.explanation:
Year of the Dragon.

	"Spyro: Year of the Dragon" is the third game in the original trilogy.  The evil Sorceress is out to collect dragon eggs and you must stop her; or else.  You meet several people in this game, including Sheila, Srgt. Byrd, Bentley, and Number Nine.  All are playable characters.  You can also play Sparks and Hunter.  Sheila is a kangaroo, Srgt. Byrd is a penguin, Bentley is a yeti, Number Nine is a crazy monkey, Sparks is a dragonfly, and Hunter is a cheetah.  The game is for the PS1. So, did you figure out why it is called "A 'Dictionary' Quiz?"  Well, look at the answers...Donkey KongIndiana JonesCrash BandicootTiger WoodsIn the safehouseOrganization XIII (13)Nina CortexAttack of the ClonesRiptoYear of the Dragon All the answers spell "dictionary!"
